description: Girl from the South Side and former First Lady. Wife, mother, dog lover. Always hugger-in-chief. #IAmBecoming

tweets.text: There‚Äôs nothing I love more than meeting with young people. Today, I had the chance to talk with some of the bright high school students from DC with @ReachHigher who shared their stories and plans for the future. I‚Äôm so proud of them and can't wait to follow their journeys. https://t.co/IfG65DrJ5x

I'm so proud of the talented players of @USWNT who worked tirelessly for years to advocate for the pay they deserve. I'm thinking of all the little girls everywhere who dare to dream and will see this team as an example of what's possible when you never give up. üëèüèæ

Today, I‚Äôll be joining @PHAnews's virtual Food Equity Summit to take part in a discussion about our Pass the Love campaign and the work we can do together to increase access to healthy and affordable food for all. Tune in now! https://t.co/lO1ycqyFBn

I‚Äôm so excited about the Voyager Scholarship! We're teaming up with @bchesky to support young leaders who are eager to make their mark, but might not have the same opportunities as others. If you're a rising college junior in the U.S., apply right now: https://t.co/nez2BKmAnB https://t.co/WTG0kIsUix
So when you get home from marching, check your voter registration status with @WhenWeAllVote and encourage others to do the same at https://t.co/PA4LvmFR0D.

If any of you are questioning whether or not your vote matters, I get it. But remember that state lawmakers are the ones who will determine whether abortion is safe, legal, and accessible in your communities. And we are the ones who determine our state lawmakers. https://t.co/Nafi5LfC8i

But we don‚Äôt have to stand idly by while others try to turn back the clock on progress. I‚Äôm so inspired by everyone out marching today. And I know that we‚Äôre going to see so many folks carrying this energy forward to the elections in November and in every election after that.

It‚Äôs been a tough couple of weeks since we saw the leaked SCOTUS draft opinion on abortion. Even if we knew the courts were heading toward this day, it doesn‚Äôt make the frustration, grief, and fear any less real.

Decades before our family lived there, First Lady Eleanor Roosevelt planted a Victory Garden on the White House lawn‚Äîand I'm thrilled to share that the Fruit & Vegetable Garden at the Obama Presidential Center will be named in her honor. I can‚Äôt wait for you all to visit! https://t.co/wAMwaAHn18

Happy #MothersDay! I'm so thankful for the love, guidance, and care that my mom has instilled in me. I‚Äôve shared so much of her wisdom with my own daughters over the years. ‚ù§Ô∏è https://t.co/EjFxs4R9by

This year for #CollegeSigningDay, I‚Äôm wearing a college shirt from @UMBC, an Asian American and Native American Pacific Islander Serving Institution in Baltimore County, MD. 

Students, I want to hear from you! Share your plans for the future using #CollegeSigningDay! üéâ https://t.co/XyiwxMGUOb

Happy College Signing Day! üéìü•≥üëèüèæ

Today, we celebrate everyone making a commitment to get their education at a community college, university, trade school, or the military.

I hope you‚Äôll share your plans with @BetterMakeRoom and me using #CollegeSigningDay! https://t.co/dMQlvb2IcF

From an early age, my mom, Marian Robinson, taught me how to think for myself, use my own voice, and understand my own worth.

Ahead of #MothersDay, I‚Äôm proud to announce that the ‚ÄúOpening the White House‚Äù exhibit at the Obama Presidential Center will be named after her. üíï https://t.co/QDhSSRRet0
I‚Äôd love to hear about a remarkable teacher in your life. Share how they contributed to who you are today and how you are celebrating them during #TeacherAppreciationWeek.

This Teacher Appreciation Week, I wanted to tell you about a teacher in California ‚Äì Ms. Tsung. She's been using the interactive resources from our Pass the Love campaign with @PHAnews to teach her 6th graders about food equity! #ThankATeacher https://t.co/kfstqoyrjd
.@smalonemd and I also spoke about women's health, aging, and menopause not too long ago on The Michelle Obama Podcast from our @HGMedia. Take a listen: https://t.co/uuDfHVeGGd

As women, we need to have more open and honest conversations about our bodies ‚Äì especially as we get older. Here's an important piece about the research and reforms needed to support those experiencing menopause.
https://t.co/Ibxdu5em2X

The South Side made my brother Craig and me who we are today, so it was extra special seeing him go back to participate in our @ObamaFoundation Futures Series. By sharing his story, he‚Äôs letting these young people know that they can also dream big and accomplish their goals. https://t.co/arvuPVBnW0
Whether you're going to a community college, a university, or joining the military, tell me where you're headed using #CollegeSigningDay! üéìüéâ
College Signing Day is one of my favorite events of the year, and I can‚Äôt wait to celebrate it virtually with @ReachHigher on May 7! https://t.co/mDZoP5yEvQ
Happy birthday, @CraigMalRob! I couldn't have asked for a better brother and friend. Here's to celebrating 60! ‚ù§Ô∏è https://t.co/DbDxYqItxa

We need to talk about the state of our democracy and the ways we can protect it right from our own communities.¬†

I'll be speaking more on this at @WhenWeAllVote's #CultureOfDemocracy Summit, and I hope you'll join us from June 10-13: https://t.co/Ce0cZImX6R https://t.co/nLWlUHNsav

And even though we‚Äôve reached our goal ‚Äì our work isn‚Äôt done. Let‚Äôs keep working until every family, in every zip code, has access to healthy food. Learn more about our Pass the Love campaign with @PHAnews at https://t.co/s0WCBvE8HK. ü•ïüçÖü•¶ü•î https://t.co/Kxhp96zQaB

Thanks to the support of so many people like you who either donated, volunteered, or helped distribute meals ‚Äì we‚Äôve helped provide meal kits to families in Atlanta, Cleveland, Detroit, Fresno, and Philadelphia. https://t.co/iAYkdip3Jg

Last spring, we launched our Pass the Love campaign with @PHAnews with the goal of distributing one million healthy meal kits to families in need.

I‚Äôm excited to share that we‚Äôve not only met our goal, but surpassed it! üíï https://t.co/tnSoylDxSY

I‚Äôm so excited for this group of Asia-Pacific Leaders to come together, share their ideas, and develop new skills to create even more change this year. Welcome‚ÄîI can‚Äôt wait to follow your journeys! https://t.co/fEBCrNe26g
Every¬†Easter, I am reminded of the power of faith and community. Wishing all those celebrating today a day of joy and renewal. https://t.co/LMFKUktBxD

Happy #NationalGardeningDay! ü•¶ü•ïüçé

At just 6-years-old, Kendall is already inspiring people of all ages with her love of farming as Georgia‚Äôs youngest certified farmer.

Her story is a reminder that you're never too young or old to get started. Share your garden photos with me! https://t.co/RFgF9hUZHk

Whether you‚Äôre visiting a national park or taking a walk around your neighborhood, there‚Äôs so much out there to explore.

We hope the show inspires you to take a trip outdoors. If you do, be sure to take part in the #WildForAll Challenge at https://t.co/sjecUm3hHF. Happy trails! https://t.co/h1kAy5Sphl

Over the years, @BarackObama and I have been lucky enough to show our girls some of the magic of our world‚Äôs natural wonders. 

This time, Barack wants you to join in on the fun with his new @HGMedia show, Our Great National Parks, which is streaming now on Netflix. üåç https://t.co/tBkX5AqFSX
Happy #NationalPetDay, Sunny! I just love spending time with my furry gal‚Äîwhose snuggles bring so much joy and delight to everyone she meets.¬†‚ù§Ô∏èüêæ https://t.co/tmQJkv0m2j

While in Chicago, Barack attended a @ChicagoBulls game with students from the @GirlsAlliance and @MBK_Alliance. 

These young people are so hard working and bright‚Äîand they deserved this night of fun! https://t.co/TGvb9zLK6A

I was so moved to see Justice Ketanji Brown Jackson confirmed this afternoon. Like so many of you, I can‚Äôt help but feel a sense of pride‚Äîa sense of joy‚Äîto know that this deserving, accomplished Black woman will be a part of the highest court in the land. https://t.co/hnPcDuPt8w

In her book, she uses the lens of the 2020 movement for racial justice to explore its impact on the Black experience‚Äîthe joy, the fear, the frustration. It is powerful, poignant, and deeply moving. I hope you‚Äôll check it out. https://t.co/2UNjkvebvG

Here's to you, @ProfessorEA! Not only is she an exceptional author and educator, she is also a trusted friend‚Äîone whose insights have challenged me to see the world in new and different ways. I‚Äôm excited to share that her latest book, ‚ÄúThe Trayvon Generation,‚Äù is available now. https://t.co/f5hEvP0QLo

Antilynching legislation was first introduced over a century ago‚Äîand failed to pass over 200 times. Now, the Emmett Till Antilynching Act is a chance to reckon with our history, and move in a new direction‚Äîone that makes this country safer and more just for us all.

Yesterday, President Biden signed the Emmett Till Antilynching Act into law‚Äîfinally designating lynching as a federal hate crime in the United States. For many Black folks, this historic moment comes with a lot of different emotions‚ÄîI know it does for me.

Congratulations, @Questlove and the team at @SummerOfSoul, for your #Oscar win! Barack and I were so moved by this celebration of Black music, culture, and joy. What you did in telling this overlooked story is so important‚Äîand we are grateful for artists like you leading the way!

This #WomensHistoryMonth, I am thinking about the next generation of girls who are working to make our world a better place‚Äîlike these talented young women I met in Hawai‚Äôi with the @GirlsAlliance. I know you'll be as inspired by their stories as I am. https://t.co/vG1ETqKSpp

Now, kids everywhere will get to hear some of our favorites through his Little Craig Series with @Vooks. I hope you‚Äôll check out the first book in his series‚ÄîLittle Craig: Balloons and Cake and many other fun stories here: https://t.co/QInO7PO4J7 https://t.co/o03gLOYzae

Growing up, my brother @CraigMalRob was my world. He was my fiercest hallway-race competitor, my protector, my back-up singer. And over the years, he‚Äôs collected some great stories about the lessons he learned along the way. ‚ù§Ô∏è

Congrats¬†to @NPSI_Believe's 2022 Power of Hope Award winners! I am grateful for the work these school counselors, teachers, and administrators have done to ensure their students have the skills and¬†support systems they need¬†to pursue their dreams and prepare for the future. üéìüëèüèæ https://t.co/8cEI2FuARi

Happy #InternationalWomensDay! 

Today, I hope you‚Äôll join the @GirlsAlliance to help empower the next generation of women‚Äîbecause when girls get the support and opportunities they deserve, it creates a better world for all of us.

Take action: https://t.co/uAJh9LbSW0 https://t.co/LAdpid42Yh

I know many of us are wondering how we can help as we continue to hear the news about Ukraine. The @ObamaFoundation has compiled a list of organizations you can support if you're thinking about what you can do to make a difference right now. https://t.co/BICGpNCSgq
What a performance! @Nandi_Bushell, I can‚Äôt wait to see where your talents take you! üëèüèæ https://t.co/BpVv6mXKJL

I‚Äôm so proud of the young women I met in Hawai ªi.

For them, this is just the beginning. I can‚Äôt wait to see what they do next. üíï https://t.co/xmTk0eQe4Z

I feel so blessed to be able to spend every day with this guy. Happy Valentine's Day, Barack! Here's to all the adventures we have ahead. ‚ù§Ô∏è https://t.co/NIYxkO900k

That day made me think: this could actually work. We could actually do this. 

And thanks to all of you, that‚Äôs exactly what we did. 

Do you remember that day, or were you involved in the campaign in any way? I would love to hear your story. Use #Obama08 to share your memories.

Fifteen years ago, Barack announced his candidacy in Springfield. It was bitter cold, but as far as my eyes could see, there were people everywhere. People from all over the state, from different backgrounds and identities‚Äîall who believed in his promise. All who believed in us. https://t.co/3n0YkeJGFH

Happy National School Counseling Week to all of the incredible school counselors who selflessly support our students each and every day! Thank you for all that you do to empower our nation‚Äôs young people. Congrats to the 2022 School Counselor of the Year, Alma Lopez! #NSCW22 üéâ https://t.co/pQvmVIOa97

When we work together, we can change the culture around voting and fight voter suppression.

That's why I‚Äôm bringing together some friends in the fight for our vote with @WhenWeAllVote. I hope you‚Äôll join us!

Text ‚Äújoin‚Äù to 56005 to get involved. https://t.co/CycbWGydVY

Nine years ago, we lost Hadiya Pendleton to the tragedy of gun violence. I know her loss is still devastating for so many. That‚Äôs why Barack and I hope that the Hadiya Pendleton Winter Garden at the Obama Presidential Center can share her light with the world. See how here: https://t.co/wKlSImpc3I

Ada Twist, Scientist, and her friends are back for Season 2! I'm so excited for families everywhere to watch their latest adventures as they try new experiments and learn new skills. Watch now on @Netflix! üë©üèæ‚Äçüî¨üî¨üß™ https://t.co/ZtLDcdLiYE

She‚Äôs done a wonderful job making the role of @FLOTUS¬†her own‚Äîworking to support military families, promote cancer research, and support educators throughout this pandemic. I‚Äôm so proud of her! ‚ù§Ô∏è https://t.co/55B0bfUeQ0

When Barack and I left the White House, we asked you to help us shape the @ObamaFoundation's work. Since then, we‚Äôve launched nine programs and connected countless leaders around the world. This is just the beginning, and we can‚Äôt wait for what's next. https://t.co/PrGkDTRbP3 https://t.co/gGX9zX8tIf

Here‚Äôs to a sweet 58th! Thank you so much for your outpouring of love. Whether you texted, emailed, or posted on social media, every birthday message I received today meant a lot to me. Looking forward to seeing what this upcoming year has in store.¬†üíï https://t.co/owA4Qidqwk

One of the best ways to honor Dr. King's legacy is to take action to help protect voting rights in our country. Text ‚ÄòMLK‚Äô to 56005 and @WhenWeAllVote will send some details you can use to call elected officials today and urge them to pass the Freedom to Vote: John R. Lewis Act. https://t.co/oo69J8KedQ

One of my favorite parts about writing Becoming and sharing my story has been seeing how it relates to so many of yours. 

I recently spoke with a group of college students about the power of owning your unique story. I hope you‚Äôll watch on @BET this Monday, 1/17 at 7pm ET. https://t.co/bBEAuUkKaE

Let's make sure that every voice is heard and every vote is counted in the 2022 midterm elections and beyond.

Take the pledge: https://t.co/Lus9IFx3fv.

In 2020, millions made their voices heard at the polls. But now, folks who oppose that progress are making it harder to vote. That‚Äôs why I‚Äôm asking you to join @WhenWeAllVote and 30 other organizations to turn out more voters and urge Congress to pass voting rights legislation. https://t.co/hwgyyuTGy9
